name: Your Number is 42
description:
This is our team's submission to the 1 week long IVGD Summer Frogjam 2022 gamejam where the theme was Liminal! You play as an individual waiting for your doctor's appointment at a medical clinic and waiting is optional!

Controls (Keyboard + Mouse / Gamepad)

The controls are also available in game!    

UI
Navigate menus: WASD keys / Left-Stick
Confirm selection: Enter or Left-Click Mouse / South Button (A on XBox)

In-Game
Move Character: WASD keys / Left-Stick
Grab and Hold Object: Hold Left-Click Mouse / Hold South Button (A on XBox)
Throw Object When Held: Release Left-Click / Release South Button (A on XBox)
Sprint: Hold Left-Shift / Hold L3 (Left Analog stick pressed down)
Pause: Escape / Start Button

Install Instructions

1. Download the windows or mac build.
2. Locate the .zip you've downloaded and extract it.
3. Inside of the "YourNumberIs42" folder, double-click the YourNumberIs42.exe
4. Enjoy!
